titleStmt.title: Five sermons, in five several styles; or Waies of preaching. The [brace] first in Bp Andrews his way; before the late King upon the first day of Lent. Second in Bp Hall's way; before the clergie at the author's own ordination in Christ-Church, Oxford. Third in Dr Maine's and Mr Cartwright's way; before the Universitie at St Maries, Oxford. Fourth in the Presbyterian way; before the citie at Saint Paul's London. Fifth in the Independent way; never preached. With an epistle rendring an account of the author's designe in printing these his sermons, as also of the sermons themselves. / By Ab. Wright, sometimes Fellow of St John Baptist Coll. in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Abraham, 1611-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Archer, at the Adam and Eve in Little Britain,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"First .. never preached." bracketed together on title page.
Each sermon has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
